name: MXDisplayMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about the power used to display the app on the screen.

items.name: var averagePixelLuminance: MXAverage<MXUnitAveragePixelLuminance>?
items.desc: The average amount of luminosity of the pixels on an OLED display.

items.name: class MXUnitAveragePixelLuminance
items.desc: A unit of measure of pixel luminosity on an OLED display.
